alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 10:11PM EDT until May 04 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... New Hampshire... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine...New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Cumberland, Oxford and Carroll Counties. Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Rockingham and Strafford Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding occurs at several camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EDT Wednesday was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 4.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
